sentences.en: A graben creates a favourable setting for uranium deposition.
sentences.cn: 地堑成为铀矿沉积的有利部位.

sentences.en: All sediment deposition is not injurious.
sentences.cn: 所有的泥沙淤积并不都是有害的.

sentences.en: Because deposition is rapid, sorting and stratification are generally not well developed.
sentences.cn: 因为沉积作用是快速的, 分选作用和层理就得不到很好的发展.

sentences.en: Central deposition of particles is favored by rapid and shallow breathing.
sentences.cn: 轻向快速的呼吸有助于粒子的中心沉降.

sentences.en: Continued deposition of silt along the coast is crucial in counteracting the rise in sea level.
sentences.cn: 海岸边泥沙的不断沉积对于抑制海平面的上升起着至关重要的作用。

sentences.en: Deposition is the laying down of sediment that has been transported.
sentences.cn: 沉积是已搬运的物质再沉积下来.

sentences.en: Frictional behavior is modified by colloidal silica or starch deposition.
sentences.cn: 耐磨损性能可以通过在织物上沉淀胶状硅或淀粉一类物质而得到改善.

sentences.en: It was this issue which led to the deposition of the king.
sentences.cn: 正是这件事导致了国王被废黜。

sentences.en: Norton has reviewed conditions of deposition of the uranium host rocks.
sentences.cn: 诺顿论述了含铀主岩的沉积条件.

sentences.en: The area and height of this deposition determine the ultimate ball size.
sentences.cn: 该淀积层的面积和高度决定了球的最终尺寸.

sentences.en: The deposition of fat may be general or local.
sentences.cn: 脂肪的沉积可以是全身性的,或者是局部性.

sentences.en: The U - shape of some glacial valleys may be due also to deposition.
sentences.cn: 某些U型冰川谷也可能起因于沉积作用.

sentences.en: The unconformity marks the change from fluvial to marginal marine deposition.
sentences.cn: 不整合面标志着河相至边缘海相沉积的相变.

sentences.en: This leads to calcium deposition in the blood-vessels.
sentences.cn: 这导致钙在血管中沉积。

sentences.en: Unconformities are surfaces of erosion or non - deposition.
sentences.cn: 不整合面是侵蚀面或无沉积面.

phrases.tran_cn: 化学气相沉积；化学汽相淀积
沉积速率；沉积速度；沉淀速度；熔敷率

trans.tran_cn: 沉积（物），[律]（在法庭上的）宣誓作证，证词，免职，革职
trans.tran_en: the act of removing someone from a position of power
